remarks: A nonzero subspace less than the sum of two atoms is an atom. ( ~ atcvati analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatcvat.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatcvat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsatcvat.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsatcvat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatcvat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatcvat.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lsatcvat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatcvat.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. A ) $.
lsatcvat.n $e |- ( ph -> U =/= { .0. } ) $.
lsatcvat.l $e |- ( ph -> U C. ( Q .(+) R ) ) $.
lsatcvat $p |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
